commandDescription: Create a Package XML file or Destructive XML file from a JSON Metadata File
outputPathFlagDescription: Path to save the generated file. By default is your manifest folder
toDeleteFlagDescription: Option to create the package to delete metadata (Destructive XML File)
deleteBeforeFlagDescription: Option to create the Descructive XML file to deploy it before package file (delete files before deploy new changes insted delete files after deploy changes).
sourceFlagDescription: Metadata JSON file path to create the Package or Destructive file
useIgnoreFlagDescription: Option to ignore the metadata included in ignore file from the package
ignoreFileFlagDescription: Path to the ignore file. Use this if you don't want to use the project root ignore file or has a different name.
wildcardsFlagDescription: Option to use wildcards instead the explicit names when apply
